title: [Marble Springs, Statue]
description: Free from weeds or stray blades of grass, the cobblestone walkway has been well-fitted and maintained, providing a secure path through the small community.  Just off the path, a quartz-veined marble statue rises from a stone flowerbed thick with wooly thyme and violets, the purple hue of the flowers making the white marble seem all the more stark and pale.

Free from weeds or stray blades of grass, the cobblestone walkway has been well-fitted and maintained, providing a secure path through the small community.  Just off the path, a quartz-veined marble statue rises from a stone flowerbed thick with wooly thyme and violets, the purple hue of the flowers making the white marble seem all the more stark and pale in the moonlight.
